items.title: Collaborative Task Management
items.description: Enable users to create, assign, and track tasks within teams, with real-time updates and shared visibility.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee
Tasks can be assigned to one or more team members
Task status changes are visible to all team members in real time
Users can comment on tasks and mention other team members
Team members receive notifications for task assignments and updates
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: Real-time updates with latency under 2 seconds
Support for at least 100 concurrent team members per workspace

notes: Assumed that the app will support both web and mobile platforms and include basic user authentication and team management features.
